cobblemon.species.chiyu.name: Chi-Yu
cobblemon.species.chiyu.desc1: It controls flames burning at over 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit. It casually swims through the sea of lava it creates by melting rock and sand.
cobblemon.species.chiyu.desc2: The envy accumulated within curved beads that sparked multiple conflicts has clad itself in fire and become a Pok√©mon.
